DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_PANEL` ( `PANEL_ID` int NOT NULL, `PANEL_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `PLANT` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `CREATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `UPDATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PANEL_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY` ( `PANEL_ID` int NOT NULL, `TRAY_ID` int NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `UPDATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `CREATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PANEL_ID`,`TRAY_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_SAMPLES` ( `TRAY_ID` int NOT NULL, `SAMPLE_ID` int NOT NULL, `SEQUENCE_ID` bigint NOT NULL, `UPDATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `CREATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TRAY_ID`,`SAMPLE_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS` ( `TRAY_ID` int NOT NULL, `SAMPLE_ID` int NOT NULL, `USER_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `TEST_ID` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `VALUE` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `UPDATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `CREATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TRAY_ID`,`SAMPLE_ID`,`USER_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_USERS` ( `USER_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `FIRST_NAME` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `SURNAME` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `ENABLED` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`USER_ID`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
